text: aaj sab svachchh khaady tumhaare lie haî€¼laal (vaidh) kar diye gaye hain aur eemaan vaalee satavantee striyaan tatha unamen se satavantee striyaan, jo tumase pahale pustak diye gaye hain, jabaki unhen unaka mahar (vivaah upahaar) chuka do, vivaah mein laane ke lie, vyabhichaar ke lie nahin aur na premika banaane ke lie. jo eemaan ko nakaar dega, usaka satkarm vyarth ho jaayega tatha paralok mein vah vinaashon mein hoga
